page.title: 11 LAND RECLAMATION-BACKWORTH.
page.content: The closure of the Eccles Colliery left a large area of derelict land around Backworth.This land is being reclaimed. Some of this land has been used to build housing in the Church Road area. Part of the old pit buildings has been developed into small factory units.The units are privately rented.One of the units is being used for trailer building.Other units are involved with house extensions and a variety of metal working. The development of this land will continue with the building of more private housing and more factory facilities.
